items.sentence: Everybody but Tom knows why his wife left him.
Everyone was laughing and having a great time.
Everything that could go wrong has gone wrong.
Except for the weather, it was a great picnic.
We\'re all thinking the same thing, I\'m sure.
Life is so much easier now than it used to be.
Mary is one of the richest women in the world.
I haven\'t talked to Tom since last Christmas.
I hear you\'ve done some pretty extreme stuff.
I knew I\'d broken my wrist the moment I fell.
